snippet: Researchers say they have developed a way to untangle a single genome from a large, metagenomic sample of many organisms.
abstract: Study by computer scientist Vaughn Iverson published in journal Science describes water filtration process that allowed Iverson to tease out and sequence the DNA of the Euryarchaeota microbe, which has eluded scientists for years.
lead_paragraph: Researchers say they have developed a way to untangle a single genome from a large, metagenomic sample of many organisms.

headline.print_headline: Plucking a Strand of Genetic Insight From the Sea
headline.seo: Euryarchaeota Has Never Been Seen, but Now Its Genome Has
headline.main: Plucking a Strand of Genetic Insight From the Sea
